_comment: All metadata are stored in the 'meta' node. This should only be altered programmatically. Any content that can be added, changed, or deleted by human admin should reside under the 'main-data' node. (The '_comment' key should be ignored by the JSON parser that will later be used.)

meta._comment: The back-end metadata of the schema (programmatically managed and controlled).

main-data._comment: The admin-controlled section of the schema.

home._comment: The home menu of the GKI Salatiga app.

info-cards._comment: Info card that shows relevant church-related information.
